name: XCTDarwinNotificationExpectation
desc: An expectation that is fulfilled when an expected Darwin notification is received.

items.name: init(notificationName: String)
items.desc: Creates an expectation that waits for a Darwin notification with the specified name to be posted.

items.name: var notificationName: String
items.desc: The name of the notification that the expectation is waiting for.

items.name: var handler: XCTDarwinNotificationExpectation.Handler?
items.desc: An optional handler that performs custom evaluation of matching notifications.

items.name: typealias XCTDarwinNotificationExpectation.Handler
items.desc: A custom handler to be called when a matching notification is received.
